author: Chad Austin
description: It's not a mistake, this cocktail does indeed contain a whopping 45ml (1Â½oz) and 30ml (1oz) flavoured sugar syrups. Yet, in a larger-than-life way, it is balanced and drinkable, although I wouldn't order a second.
name: Trinidadi Issues
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Angostura or other aromatic bitters
22.5 ml Blended & aged 3-5yo med-bodied molasses rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
